long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily calculate term averages with the Term Average Calculator extension! This handy tool integrates seamlessly with school.lionboylev.com and e-diary.emis.am to streamline the process of calculating your term marks.

Key Features:

Automatic Calculation: Instantly process term average mark requests from both supported websites.
Custom Requests: Visit school.lionboylev.com to make your own calculation requests directly.
User-Friendly Interface: Effortless and intuitive, designed for students who want to quickly check their academic performance.

Simplify your academic tracking and ensure accurate term average calculations with just a few clicks!
